plugin.name: CSV Import Export
plugin.description: Import and export content types as CSV files
app.import.hint.contentType: The UID of the content type (e.g. api::article.article)
app.import.hint.idField: Field used to identify existing records for upsert (e.g. slug). Leave blank to always create new records.
app.import.result.title: Import completed
app.import.result.summary: {total} rows processed: {created} created, {updated} updated, {skipped} skipped, {failed} failed
app.export.hint.contentType: The UID of the content type to export (e.g. api::article.article)
app.export.hint.excludeFields: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude (e.g. documentId,createdAt,updatedAt)
app.error.title: Error
